text: Getting Even is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithGetting EvenGETTING EVEN and stars Billy Quirk, Mary Pickford, and James Kirkwood. ==Actors== *Billy Quirk - Bud *Mary Pickford - Miss Lucy *James Kirkwood - Jim Blake *Edwin August *Florence Barker *Kate Bruce - Party Guest *Verner Clarges - Party Guest *John R. Cumpson - miner *Arthur V. Johnson - Party Guest *Florence La Badie *George Nichols - miner *Anthony O'Sullivan - miner *Lottie Pickford - Party Guest *Gertrude Robinson - Party Guest *Mack Sennett - miner *Henry B. Walthall - miner ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Getting Even (1909 movie)
